function.name: search_sources
function.description: Retrieve sources from the Azure AI Search index

search_query.description: Query string to retrieve documents from azure search eg: 'Part 1, Overriding Objective'

subsection_hint.description: Specific subsection identifier for precise citation (e.g., '1.1' for rule 1.1, 'A4.1' for court guide section A4.1, 'Para 1.1' for practice direction paragraph 1.1)
